newsitem.title: USA: Mobilemedia gets okay on DIP financing.
newsitem.headline: Mobilemedia gets okay on DIP financing.

text.p: MobileMedia Corp said on Wednesday that U.S. Bankruptcy Court has approved the company's debtor in possession facility.
The company previously announced that Chase Manhattan Bank, as agent, is providing up to $200 million in financing.
Mobilemedia, a paging and personal communications service, said it has already used $48 million of the facility to pay key suppliers.
The court's approval gives the company access to an additional $30 million of the facility for a total of $100 million, Mobilemedia said.
The remaining $100 million will become available on May 1, 1997, if the company delivers a business plan by April 15, 1997 that is approved by the banks' financial advisor, Mobilemedia said.
